name: Aloo Gobi
desc: Delicious cauliflower and potatoes cooked in our special onion sauce and garnished with fresh garlic & herbs.

name: Bombay Aloo
desc: Chunks of potatoes cooked with onion, tomato sauce & butter to velvet the texture.Saag paneer Curd cheese and fresh spinach puree cooked in a light creamy tomato sauce with butter texture.

name: Chana Masala
desc: Boiled chickpeas with tomato sauce and spices.

name: Dalmakhani
desc: Black lentils and kidney beans cooked together with soft butter and cream taste.

name: Mushroom Bhuna
desc: Mushroom cooked in onion, tomato gravy with fresh spices.

name: Paneer Jalfrazi
desc: Curd cheese pieces cooked with onion, peppers and Jalfrazi sauce.

name: Bhindi Bhaji
desc: Fresh okra fried and cooked with diced tomatoes,onions and aromatic spices.

name: Tadka Daal
desc: Mixed lentils cooked with spices, garnished with cumin, chopped garlic and green chilli.

name: Mix Veg Jalfrazi
desc: Mixed vegetables cooked with fresh tomatoes green peppers and spices in a precisely spiced gravy

name: Paneer Tikka Masala
desc: Grilled paneer cooked in masala sauce.

name: Paneer Makhani
desc: Tandoori roasted curd cheese cooked with tomato garnished with a dash of cream and butter.
